thread.title: Akron plans to make 4 downtown one-way roads two-way: See where and why
thread.title_full: Akron plans to make 4 downtown one-way roads two-way: See where and why

author: Emily Bamforth, cleveland.com
title: Akron plans to make 4 downtown one-way roads two-way: See where and why
text: Work to convert Akron's West Exchange Street from one-way to two is expected to begin this spring. Converting Exchange and Cedar streets to two-way streets could have many benefits for economic development in the downtown area, Akron Mayor Dan Horrigan said.
